body_html:
Hi @stephenjia ,I have the same problem with you.But I don not know how many virtury memory to increase,Will virtual memory be twice the size of memory?Becaues My Linux partition spaces are not enough，how to expand swap partition in Ubuntu 16.04 dual-boot system(Windows10 &Ubuntu16.04)?
Can you help me on these? Thanks a lot.
